void CMP_ClearFlag ( HT_CMP_TypeDef *  HT_CMPn,
u32  CMP_FLAG_x 
)

Clear flags of the specified CMP.

Parameters:
HT_CMPn,:where HT_CMPn is the selected CMP from the CMP peripherals.
CMP_FLAG_x,:specify the flag to be checked. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • CMP_FLAG_RE : CMP rising edge flag
  • CMP_FLAG_FE : CMP falling edge flag
Return values:
None

void CMP_EdgeDetectConfig ( HT_CMP_TypeDef *  HT_CMPn,
u32  CMP_xE_Detect,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the specified CMP edge detection.

Parameters:
HT_CMPn,:where HT_CMPn is the selected CMP from the CMP peripherals.
CMP_xE_Detect,:specify the CMP edge detection that is to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • CMP_RE_Detect : CMP rising edge detection
  • CMP_FE_Detect : CMP falling edge detection
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 193 of file ht32f5xxxx_cmp.c.

FlagStatus CMP_GetFlagStatus ( HT_CMP_TypeDef *  HT_CMPn,
u32  CMP_FLAG_x 
)

Check whether the specified CM flag has been set.

Parameters:
HT_CMPn,:where HT_CMPn is the selected CMP from the CMP peripherals.
CMP_FLAG_x,:specify the flag to be checked. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • CMP_FLAG_RE : CMP rising edge flag
  • CMP_FLAG_FE : CMP falling edge flag
Return values:
SETor RESET

void CMP_IntConfig ( HT_CMP_TypeDef *  HT_CMPn,
u32  CMP_INT_x,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the specified CMP interrupts.

Parameters:
HT_CMPn,:where HT_CMPn is the selected CMP from the CMP peripherals.
CMP_INT_x,:specify the CMP interrupt sources that is to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • CMP_INT_RE : CMP rising edge interrupt
  • CMP_INT_FE : CMP falling edge interrupt
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None
